Nationalist Rebels: Nationalist rebels seek freedom for their people. They are well led and equipped, and they will focus on achieving independence for their countrz.
Separatist rebels dream of unification with their cultural kin under a free banner. Beware, for provinces taken by them may defect.
Slave revolters seek to free all slaves in $COUNTRY$.
Militant Republican Reformists seek to improve or introduce the voting franschise in a realm.
Pretender Rebels support another interest group's claim to their realm, and seek to install them as their ruler.
